text: Jørgen Lorentzen (born 4 November 1956) is a Norwegian author and researcher of gender studies.https://snl.no/mannsforskningTyrkia tar demokratiet til fange. Aftenposten.no He has been chief of the trade union, Norsk faglitterær forfatter- og oversetterforening. In 2019 he became a member of the municipal council of Nesodden.Medlemmer i kommunestyret i perioden 2019-2023 .
